items.title: Ballard Spahr and Levine Sullivan Koch & Schulz will merge
items.summary:
Am Law 100 firm Ballard Spahr and Levine Sullivan Koch & Schulz (LSKS)—the preeminent First Amendment and media law boutique in the United States—announced that they have agreed to merge effective October 1, 2017. The powerhouse combination, which will retain the name Ballard Spahr, brings together two nationally renowned media law practices and creates a team that represents the biggest and most prominent names in the industry. All 25 of LSKS’s lawyers, including its four!

The post Ballard Spahr and Levine Sullivan Koch & Schulz will merge appeared first on AZ Big Media.
